description:
The documentation section about running a subset of tests (http://docs.openstack.org/developer/nova/devref/unit_tests.html#running-a-subset-of-tests) is wrong (or out of date).

To run a tests in some specific class you have to pass the arguments to the run_tests.sh script following the format:
./run_tests.sh <package>.<class_name>
and not <package>:<class_name>, as the documentation says.
title: Nova documentation for running a subset of unit tests is out of date
